alert.note: Alert for Ingham; Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jackson and southern Ingham Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 643 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Leslie, or 10 miles south of Eaton Rapids, moving east northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mason... Leslie... Stockbridge... Aurelius... Onondaga... Bunker Hill... Springport... Parma... Dansville... Eden... Fitchburg... Tompkins... Rives Junction... Mason Jewett Airport... Munith... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
